title: Riot Repayments website not working
body:
I don't know if it's just me. but I cannot get on that website to repay Riot for the chargeback I had.
It comes up as 
OOPS!

Sorry, this feature is not currently available in your region

every time I go there it says this.
I'M IN NORTH AMERICA 
please fix this ASAP.

replies.body: Yeah same problem here and my account was banned for 5 days and I finally just get an email today saying I have a $5 chargeback. So I am impatient to get my account unlocked.

If you have tried to manually pay using PayPal just wait a day. I'm pretty sure it didn't let me pay because I did this. And my account got unlocked. So you can use the other methods even though you are in NA

I checked out the site and not having any issues.  You may need to [clear your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), and log out completely for a fix.  Manually go to the main league page on NA  to login, then head over to the repayment page.  You can also try Incognito mode or another browser just in case.  Let me know if you still have any issues with this!
Can we like get an explanation here to why it's down or when it will be back up... There is like no where to look for the status of the site.
